item.title: Thule Bike Rack
item.description:
Description

Thule roof-mounted bike rack for one bicycle. Compatible with most roof rack systems. Includes all necessary mounting hardware and keys.

Additional Notes

This item has been sold.

item.title: Universal Car Cover
item.description:
Description

High-quality universal car cover suitable for mid-size sedans and small SUVs. Weather-resistant material protects against UV rays, rain, snow, and dust.

Features elastic hem for secure fit and reinforced grommets for tie-down straps. Used seasonally for outdoor car storage.

Additional Notes

  • Fits vehicles 14-16 feet in length
  • UV-resistant polypropylene material
  • Water-resistant but not waterproof
  • Includes tie-down straps
  • Some minor wear but no tears
  • Machine washable
